content: Fight your way to the top of the stairs and keep staff spinning to deflect the ranged attacks until all the Blazebones are dead. At the end of this high raised wooden platform you’ll find another of the giant statue heads, allowing you to take its Buhdda’s Eyeball.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'The Third Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
Fight your way to the top of the stairs and keep staff spinning to deflect the ranged attacks until all the Blazebones are dead. At the end of this high raised wooden platform you’ll find another of the giant statue heads, allowing you to take its Buhdda’s Eyeball.
